sentences.sentence: In Ukraine, around 35 Shahi drones were launched by Moscow on several towns in the eastern and southern parts of the country. In Yikopol, near Dnipro, the bombardments killed two women and wounded one man. In recent weeks, Russia has stepped up its attacks on regions of western Ukraine, far from the front line, and claims to be able to eliminate Ukrainian drones flying over its territory without much difficulty. Russian army chief of staff also added that he was firmly defending his positions. He is building fortifications along the 2,000-kilometre front line to contain the advance of Russian troops, a defensive strategy favoured by the Ukrainian army following the failure of its counteroffensive this summer.

MALCOLM BRABANT, The diamond sector in Antwerp is preparing to apply the newly agreed sanctions

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: against Russian diamonds.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: After months of deliberation, the new measures agreed between the G7 and E.U. countries will start working progressively from January 1.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: The first to be hit will be rough diamonds, of which Russia is the largest exporter globally, with 30 percent of the total production by volume. But tracking diamonds isn't easy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: This will be a blockchain system where the transformation of a diamond is fully recorded and that you can track basically what is going on with the diamonds.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Every diamond that will be sold in countries that impose the sanctions will have to travel first to Antwerp in Belgium to be certified.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Through this system, the Belgian city will not be as hard hit by the sanctions aimed at punishing Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: So Antwerp has been always the most important trading hub for diamonds, yes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: We were losing that. With the current system in place, which I think is a really good system, yeah, the flows will come back to the European Union and you have an impact. Having both the G7 and EU on board was key to ensuring that the system would actually hit Russia and the diamonds will not be sold elsewhere, both by around 70 percent of diamonds globally. In 2021, Russia exported $400 billion worth of diamonds, most of them by a single company, Arosa.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Bosnia's capital Sarajevo has been intermittently engulfed in a toxic haze since the start of

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: December.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Its air quality is so bad it has ranked top on a list of the world's most polluted cities for two days in a row.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The Swiss air technology company IQ Air compiles a real-time list of city air quality, rating from good to hazardous.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: On Wednesday, it put Sarajevo's air quality in the very unhealthy category.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: It's not a new problem.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: There have been protests by locals dating back to 2020.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: At the time, experts said air pollution in the Balkans was due in part to the use of coal-fueled power plants and old cars. Since then, the Sarajevo authorities have pledged to make the city carbon-free by 2035.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: But a cost-of-living crisis has forced people to rely on cheaper, dirtier fuels to heat their homes, and there's just no money to buy new cars.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Many locals feel the need to wear masks when the pollution gets bad. Sarajevo has to do something, and the city has been included among a hundred others the European Union is helping to reach net zero emissions it's currently developing action and investment plans for climate neutrality across all sectors Leon's Lumiere Institute welcomed a famous filmmaker, perhaps the greatest living documentary

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: filmmaker of them all.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Frederic Wiseman, with almost 50 films to his credit, came in person at age 93 to present a four-hour film that takes its audience on a journey of what the day-to-day life is like at the three Michelin star restaurant little a world-famous restaurant not far from Lyon behind which lies a family dynasty of great chefs from father to son.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: I think that Trois Gros, César and Michel are artists, and what you see is their art being produced, even though it's ephemeral and it's consumed quickly.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: But they are artists in every sense of the word that painters or writers are artists.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: As in all Frederic Wiseman films, there's no commentary, no interviews, no sound and no additional music.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: He writes films and edits them himself.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: And then you have our daughter Marion, who works in the hotel room.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: And Marie-Pierre, of course, my wife, who does all that. Il les édite lui-même. to shoot a film like that because we work 12 hours a day and then when we come home we see the rocks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: And that way the documentaries are a form of sport.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: We have to be in good physical condition.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The result is worthy of a three-star mail.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The film received a standing ovation at Venice and will be released in France and Europe on December 20th.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Several hundred Serbian citizens rallied once again in the capital Belgrade

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: to protest against alleged voter fraud.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: It follows calls by the main opposition camp to object to the weekend's election results that have been marred by reports of irregularities.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The government has reportedly agreed to rerun the polls in some areas, but the members of the coalition Serbia Against Violence say they will seek the annulment of elections at all levels.
